aboutusP: Hawiya is an NFT marketplace introduces the culture in Saudi Arabia and around the globe, focusing on the cultural aspects like history, famous places and traditions. We aim to Create comprehensive collections that promotes Arabian cultures, Illustrate the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's tourist attractions and Build an Arab community in the NFT sector. Collectors and artist can now have a connected channel that helps them trade art pieces and digital arts seamless while preserving the rights of both of them. Our vision is to provide those interested the opportunity to explore Saudi culture and own their unique pieces of art.
